subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Linebacker Elvis Dumervil and the Denver Broncos agree to a $61.5 million contract extension through 2015 that includes $43.168 million in guarantees, a record for a player at his pass-rushing position.
snippet: Linebacker Elvis Dumervil and the Denver Broncos agree to a $61.5 million contract extension through 2015 that includes $43.168 million in guarantees, a record for a player at his pass-rushing position.
